attributes.action: Put to a vote to the British people about aid money going to Ukraine
attributes.additional_details: With alot of hardship also happening to the UK at the moment monies spent in aid should be going to the UK population in its time of need. Living crisis,pay crisis,NHS crisis,fuel crisis,strike crisis.Non of us would ever want a country to go through what they are, but we're is the endless pot of money going to.
attributes.background: We are all distressed by the plight of Ukrainian and the hardship they are going through. But surely the money of the people being spent through this government must come to an end sometime. Another 15 million pledged today.
